attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years, every Official form that I have received where the responders ethnicity is requested omits the term "English".  That even applied in the case of the last census.
The omission of the term is an insult to those of us who are English by birth and decent.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "order that all public documents where ethnicity is requested to include "English" along side "Scottish" or "Welsh"or "Irish". Too many people feel that the term "British" is an insult to those who are English when other citizens of the United Kingdom are permitted to use other descriptions."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15331.asp
